title: Ray Dalio Says the Fed Is Almost Out of Firepower
text: Bridgewater’s founder foresees major challenges during the next downturn.

title: The Secret To 200% Price Returns From REITs
text: Last time we had a July like this, REITs ran wild.

title: Trade War Is Hiding China's Big Problems
text: The ongoing US-China trade war is a distraction from China’s big problems: the blowing of multiple bubbles and the country’s soaring debt, which will eventually kill economic growth.

title: Investing Insights: Bold Bond Picks, Top Cannabis Stocks, and Tips for Gig Workers
text: On this week's podcast, the pitfalls of market-cap-weighted indexing, what M&A activity means for payment processors, and floating-rate funds.

title: The Fed Is Going To Cut Rates: Be Careful What You Wish For
text: Fed head Jerome Powell’s assuring testimony in front of Congress hinted more than ever that a rate cut would be made later this month. But are declining interest rates bullish for stocks?

title: Between gold, silver and bitcoin, here's the most popular safety play with traders
text: In 2019, investors are seeking safety in gold, silver and bitcoin, and with risks rising, traders have their clear favorites in their group.

title: SEB chair: Europe needs investment to stay competitive with US, China
text: SEB Chair Marcus Wallenberg says Europe needs a "more concerted effort" to bring it forward on the global stage.

title: IRS warns crypto holders: dodge tax and we'll hand out stiff punishments
text: Watch out, crypto-heads – the taxman cometh. The Internal Revenue Service has begun mailing more than 10,000 letters to cryptocurrency holders warning of stiff penalties if they fail to report income or pay tax on crypto transactions.
